name: Protect
description: I need to insure my assets. I need a personalised financial plan

products.name: Car insurance
products.shortDescription: Enjoy the mobility and independence your wheels give you.
salesHighlights: Premiums are calculated based on key risk factors eg, make and model of the vehicle, age of the driver, number of claims experienced, value of the vehicle being insured, excesses applied, and more
Maximum Cover Amount - Dependant on vehicle make, model and retail value of the vehicle
Policy Term - renewed annually
Underwriting - Risk underwriting applied
We cover private motor cars, motorcycles, boats, caravans, trailers and small watercraft.
You can choose from several car insurance cover options
We'll cover the costs of breakdowns, emergency repairs as well as replacing the keys and locks to your vehicle.
We'll give you various car hire options should you need a replacement vehicle while yours is being repaired.
You'll get access to home, road and medical assistance services 24 hours a day, all-year round.
Death benefit - Available on request
Disability benefit - Available on request
Retrenchment benefit - Available on request

products.name: Home contents insurance
products.shortDescription: Protect the possessions you love with a partner you can trust.
salesHighlights: Premiums are calculated based on key risk factors eg, construction of the house, security measures in place, number of claims experienced, value of the household content being insured, and more.
Maximum Cover Amount - Dependant on construction of the home and replacement value of the household content
Policy Term - renewed annually
Underwriting - Risk underwriting applied
Our house hold contents insurance covers the valuables inside your home such as your furniture, carpets and electronic devices
Our all-risks cover insures those items you take out of your home such as your clothing, sun glasses, briefcase and handbag.
You can also cover the loss of important documents, the cost of data recovery should your computer crash or the cost of replacing your lost or stolen credit or debit cards
Death benefit - Available on request
Disability benefit - Available on request
Retrenchment benefit - Available on request

products.name: Building insurance
products.shortDescription: Protect the home you treasure against fire and flood damage as well as other natural disasters.
salesHighlights: Premiums are calculated based on key risk factors eg, construction of the house, province and area of the home location, number of claims experienced, value of the household content being insured, and more.
Maximum Cover Amount - Dependant on construction of the home and replacement value of the building
Policy Term - renewed annually
Underwriting - Risk underwriting applied
Our preapproved suppliers offer an efficient 24- hour claims service
Your premium is deducted by a direct debit against your bond, so you know you are always covered.
The sum insured is increased automatically, in an effect to ensure that your insurance always keeps up with inflation.
Personal liability cover at no extra charge. This covers you should someone claim from you as a result of an insured event
Disability benefit - Available on request
Retrenchment benefit - Available on request

products.name: Bondability
products.shortDescription: Taking care of your home loan in the event of death or disability with the option of full term or 24 months.
salesHighlights: Premiums are based on various rating factors, for example cover amount, age, gender, occupation, smoker status, education and income level.
Maximum Cover Amount - R1500000
Policy Term - 10, 15, 20, 25 or 30 yrs
Underwriting - No medical underwriting or HIV testing
Ease of application
No medicals or HIV testing
Tailored made home loan assurance relieves the homeowners of bond repayments in the event of : injury or illness resulting in the homeowners death or disability.
Flexibility allows the level of security to be adjusted to accommodate budgetary and / or home loan increases
Excess cover can provide additional security for financial needs
Home loan assurance ensures that financial resources are not compromised by unsettled home loan obligations
Provides additional security to the lending bank
Up to 3 months free cover while bond registration pending

Death benefit - In the event of death BondAbility will pay a benefit equal to the specified cover amount. If the cover amount is greater than the outstanding home loan balance, the payment will provide additional funds to the family, which will be paid into the home loan account.

Disability benefit - BondAbility pays the installments while the homeowner is unable to perform own their occupation or any other occupation reasonably fitted for, due to standard of education, training, experience or ability

Instalment Protector Benefit - If either or both Lives Assured are prevented as a result of illness or bodily injury from working for a period of more than 90 days, monthly installments will be paid until both Lives Assured are sufficiently recovered

products.name: Bond Cover
products.shortDescription: Taking care of your home loan in the event of death or disability.
salesHighlights: Premiums are based on various rating factors; age and gender.
Maximum Cover Amount - R1500000
With our death benefit your home loan balance will be paid up to R1,5 million should you pass away.
You can choose a bond insurance product that will either pay off the lump sum or pay your monthly instalments in the event of disability
We'll help you pay your debt so you can focus on your future.

Death benefit - In the event of occupational disabiity (illness or injury of the life insured that results in permanent disablement for a continious preiod of more than six calender months from his/her usual or similar occupation) will pay the sum assured as determined at the date of disability. The sum assured will be the same as the value specified as the cover amount

Disability benefit - In the event of occupational disabiity (illness or injury of the life insured that results in permanent disablement for a continious preiod of more than six calender months from his/her usual or similar occupation) will pay the sum assured as determined at the date of disability. The sum assured will be the same as the value specified as the cover amount

products.name: Accident and health insurance
products.shortDescription: Ensure your quality of life, no matter what happens.
salesHighlights: Premium varies depending on the cover amount

Maximum Cover Amount - Health Assist Plan: Daily benefit of R3 000 per day, Personal Accident: maximum benefit between the range of R50, 000 and R700 000 (depending on the plan type). A maximum benefit payable for children age 6 months – 5 years is R10 000 and 6 - 14 years is R30 000.

The Daily Hospital Benefit provides a payment, the Daily Hospital Benefit amount (sum insured) specified in the Policy Schedule, for each full day an Insured Person was Hospitalised as a result of an Accident, during the Period of Insurance.
Nedgroup Insurance Company will calculate the period of Hospitalisation in accordance with the number of full days spent in a Hospital as a Resident In-Patient as a result of an Accident.
The benefit payment shall be payable at the end of the period of Hospitalisation or when 30 (thirty) days' benefit is due, whichever is earlier.
The Daily Hospital Benefit does not acquire any surrender value or paid-up value.
Nedgroup Insurance Company will calculate the period of Hospitalisation in accordance with the number of full days spent in a Hospital as a Resident In-Patient as a result of an Accident.
The benefit payment shall be payable at the end of the period of Hospitalisation or when 30 (thirty) days' benefit is due, whichever is earlier.
The Daily Hospital Benefit does not acquire any surrender value or paid-up value.
Personal Accident policies pay out a maximum benefit between the range of R50, 000 and R700 000 (depending on the plan that the client has elected).
A maximum benefit payable for children age 6 months – 5 years is R10 000 and 6 - 14 years is R30 000.
This policy offers the client worldwide cover, 24 hours a day.
Benefits are payable if death or disablement resulting from an accident occurs within 12 months (365 days) of the date of the accident.

products.name: Travel insurance
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your time away from home with travel insurance that really protects you.
salesHighlights: As a Nedbank Cardholder, you get basic automatic travel insurance for both local and international travel when you purchase your travel ticket (s) on your Nedbank Credit or Cheque Card.
This insurance has been designed with you in mind as a Nedbank Cardholder to protect you while you travel.
Because certain events and pre-existing medical conditions are not covered under the basic automatic insurance, we have arranged optional top-up packages to enhance your cover.

products.name: Disability insurance
products.shortDescription: Get a lump sum to pay debts and afford lifestyle adjustments should you become disabled, or functionally or physically impaired.

products.name: Legal cover
products.shortDescription: Helping you and your family cover legal costs.

products.name: Credit card insurance
products.shortDescription: We'll take care of your credit card debt in the event of death, temprary and permanent disability, diagnosis of a critical illness or retrenchment.
salesHighlights: Balance Protection Plan - R3.89 per R1 000. (Premium is calculated on the highest outstanding balance from the last statement)
Payment Protection Plan - R 7.90 per R 1 000. (Premium is calculated on the highest outstanding balance from the last statement)
Balance protection Plan - Maximum cover is R100 000 for all benefits except retrenchment were the limit is R20 000.
Payment Protection Plan - Maximum cover is R150 000 for all benefits except retrenchment were the limit is R20 000.
Policy term - No Fixed Term
You'll get peace of mind that your credit card debt will be taken care of so your family won't have to bear the financial burden.
You can choose from two plans that have different cover limits: R100 000 or R150 000.
If you pass away, get diagonsed with a critical illness or be permanently disabled we'll pay the full cover amount.

If you are temporarily disabled we'll pay up to 6 monthly instalments under the credit agreement (five payments of 17.5% each and one payment of 12.5% of the cover amount), with an overriding maximum of 100% of the cover amount.
If you are retrenched we'll pay up to 6 monthly installments equal to 10% of the cover amount paid unti life insured finds employment.
Death benefit - In the event of death will pay the full cover amount.

Disability benefit - In the event of permanent disabity will pay the full cover amount but for temporary disability will pay up to 6 monthly instalments under the credit agreement (five payments of 17.5% each and one payment of 12.5% of the cover amount), with an overriding maximum of 100% of the cover amount.
Retrenchment benefit - In the event of retrenchment will pay up to 6 monthly installments equal to 10% of the cover amount paid unti life insured finds employment.

products.name: Overdraft Insurance
products.shortDescription: Make sure your overdraft debt is paid in the event of death,disability or retrenchment.
salesHighlights: Premium - R3,30 per R1 000 of the recorded overdraft limit per month
Maximum Cover Amount - R50 000
Policy term - No Fixed Term
If you pass away or are permanently disabled, Nedbank Insurance will pay your overdraft debt, not exceeding R50 000

If you are disabled we'll pay up to 6 monthly instalments under the credit agreement (five payments of 17.5% each and one payment of 12.5% of the cover amount), with an overriding maximum of 100% of the cover amount.
Death benefit - In the event of death Nedbank Insurance will pay your overdraft debt not exceeding R50 000.
Retrenchment benefit - If you are retrenched, Nedbank Insurance will pay up to six monthly instalments, each equal to 10% of your insured overdraft limit, up to a maximum of R30 000 per claim event.

products.name: Personal Loan Insurance
products.shortDescription: Pay back your personal loan debt in the event of death, disability or retrenchment.
salesHighlights: Premium - Premium calculations are based on Client's risk rating.
Maximum Cover Amount - R250 000
Policy term - 6 - 72 months
If you pass away, we'll pay up to R250 000 to help cover your personal loan.
If you are disabled, become critically ill or are retrenched, we'll pay your monthly instalments.
You'll meet the compulsory requirement to have insurance with a Nedbank personal loan.
Death benefit - In the event of death will pay the outstanding debt not exceeding R250 000 to help cover your personal loan.
Retrenchment benefit - In the event of retrenchment Nedbank Insurance will pay the monthly instalment for a maximum of 12 months (6 months where the term of the loan is 6 months)

products.name: Student Loan Insurance
products.shortDescription: Make sure your student loan debt is paid in the event of death,disability or retrenchment.
salesHighlights: Premium - R0.35 per R1 000 of the outstanding balance each month
Policy term - Same term as student loan
Death benefit - If you pass away, we'll pay your outstanding loan amount.
Disability benefit - If you become disabled before reaching the age of 33 we'll pay your outstanding loan amount if your disability is permanent.

products.name: Income Investments
products.shortDescription: Get a set monthly income from your initial investment.

products.name: Nedbank Insurance funeral plan
products.shortDescription: Celebrate life today, knowing that tomorrow is taken care of.
salesHighlights: Premium - Premiums are based on entry age and cover amount
Maximum Cover Amount - R50 000
Policy term - Whole life
Underwriting - No medical underwriting or HIV testing
You and your spouse can buy cover of up to R50 000. If you choose a family package, the cover amount for your spouse will be limited to R20 000.
If you are insured under the plan, the cover for dependants will be specified as a percentage of your cover, subject to the product limits

If you pay your premiums by debit order, you will be covered in the event of accidental death as soon as the application has been submitted to Nedgroup Life. If you pay in cash, you will be covered as soon as you pay the first premium.

You, your immediate family and your helper (s) [domestic worker (s)] will be covered in the event of natural death after a six-month waiting period. Other insured lives will be covered after a 12-month waiting period.
If you are experiencing financial difficulties but pay a minimum of R20, your policy will still be valid. However, your cover will be adjusted accordingly.
Many more benefits exists on this cover

products.name: Gold Funeral Plan
products.shortDescription: Closed to new business. Applicable only to existing policyholders
salesHighlights: Premium - Individual: R21.50, R43.00, R64.50
Premium - Family: R28.50, R57.00, R85.50
Premium - Younger than 64: R31.50, R63.00, R94.50
Premium - 65 and older: R70.00, R140.00, R210.00
Maximum Cover Amount - R30 000
Policy term - Death of the main member if no substitute main member is nominated.
Policy term - If the premium is not received within 3 months of application the application will be cancelled
Policy term - If a covered life no longer qualifies as a covered life
Underwriting - No medical underwriting or HIV testing
Immediate accidental-death cover for you and your family from the date of receipt of the first premium.
A tax-free lump sum benefit paid into your or your beneficiary's bank account.

Maximum flexibility with a choice of three plans: An individual plan that covers only you, at a very affordable premium. A family plan that covers you, your spouse and your children. A parent plan that covers your parents and parents-in-law.
Variable premium debit dates to meet your specific needs.
Cover for life, provided you continue paying your premiums.
The flexibility to adjust the level of cover.
The flexibility to add additional children when they are born.
The option to cover children older than 21 if they are fulltime students younger than 26 years.
Settlement of all valid claims within 48 hours of receiving all the required documents and account details.
A simple application process.
A 30-day cooling-off period in which to cancel the policy if you are not entirely satisfied.

products.name: Premier Funeral Plan
products.shortDescription: A comprehensive plan with added disability, retrenchment and grocery benefits
